Name: Creature Romances: Kokonoe Kokoro
About the game: Like the Creature Romances series? Be sure to check out Creature Romances: For the Ladies as well! This work contains many disturbing, grotesque images and images of non-human creatures. Please be aware of this if you decide to buy this game. Creature Romances - Kokonoe kokoro - BUG REPORT! Take on the role of Ichitarou Ichinose, an average, easy-going high schooler with an average life. He doesn’t know what his dreams for the future are. He doesn’t have any exceptional talents. But can he win the heart of his childhood friend, Kokonoe Kokoro? She isn't like the other girls. She's a grasshopper. A big one. Enjoy this sweet and charming romance story, with a life-or-death decision at the end. Will they live happily ever after or die without achieving even a fragment of their dreams? Remember: true beauty isn't found on the outside... exoskeletons are. Contains explicit insect-ual content
